/* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */ import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { TiShoppingCart } from "react-icons/ti"; import Badge from "react-bootstrap/Badge"; import { dataActions } from "../state/config/actions"; const Home = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const { fetchedData, cartItems } = useSelector((state) => state.data); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [displayData, setDisplayData] = useState(fetchedData); const buttonClickedHandler = (cartItem) => { console.log(`cartItems`, cartItems); dispatch(dataActions.addITemToCart(cartItem)); }; useEffect(() => { if (displayData.length === 0) dispatch(dataActions.fetchData()); }, []); useEffect(() => { setDisplayData(fetchedData); }, [fetchedData]); useEffect(() => { if (searchValue === "") setDisplayData(fetchedData); }, [searchValue]); return (
